moves.name: Aura Sphere
moves.description: The user looses a blast of aura power from deep within its body at the target. This move is certain to hit.

moves.name: Reversal
moves.description: An all-out attack that becomes more powerful the less HP the user has.

moves.name: Pound
moves.description: The target is physically pounded with a long tail or a foreleg, etc.

moves.name: Meditate
moves.description: The user meditates to awaken the power deep within its body and raise its Attack stat.

moves.name: Detect
moves.description: It enables the user to evade all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

moves.name: Fake Out
moves.description: An attack that hits first and makes the target flinch. It only works the first turn the user is in battle.

moves.name: Meditate
moves.description: The user meditates to awaken the power deep within its body and raise its Attack stat.

moves.name: Detect
moves.description: It enables the user to evade all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

moves.name: Fake Out
moves.description: An attack that hits first and makes the target flinch. It only works the first turn the user is in battle.

moves.name: Double Slap
moves.description: The target is slapped repeatedly, back and forth, two to five times in a row.

moves.name: Swift
moves.description: Star-shaped rays are shot at the opposing team. This attack never misses.

moves.name: Calm Mind
moves.description: The user quietly focuses its mind and calms its spirit to raise its Sp. Atk and Sp. Def stats.

moves.name: Force Palm
moves.description: The target is attacked with a shock wave. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Drain Punch
moves.description: An energy-draining punch. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

moves.name: Jump Kick
moves.description: The user jumps up high, then strikes with a kick. If the kick misses, the user hurts itself.

moves.name: U-turn
moves.description: After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

moves.name: Wide Guard
moves.description: The user and its allies are protected from wide-ranging attacks for one turn. If used in succession, its chance of failing rises.

moves.name: Bounce
moves.description: The user bounces up high, then drops on the target on the second turn. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: High Jump Kick
moves.description: The target is attacked with a knee kick from a jump. If it misses, the user is hurt instead.

moves.name: Reversal
moves.description: An all-out attack that becomes more powerful the less HP the user has.

moves.name: Aura Sphere
moves.description: The user looses a blast of aura power from deep within its body at the target. This move is certain to hit.
